sentences.en: But if it fails, then there is no guarantee of repayment.
sentences.cn: 但是如果公司破产, 那么就不能保证能收回投资了.

sentences.en: He failed to meet last Friday's deadline for repayment of a 114m loan.
sentences.cn: 他没能在上星期五的最后期限前偿还1.14亿的贷款。

sentences.en: He had to resort to threats of court action to get repayment.
sentences.cn: 他不得不用诉讼相威胁以求获得偿还.

sentences.en: He was relentless in demanding repayment of the debt.
sentences.cn: 他冷酷无情地要求偿还那笔债.

sentences.en: I've never heard of repayment with tears before.
Liquidating collateral is clearly a second best source of repayment. Why?
sentences.cn: 抵押品显然并不是获得贷款偿还的最佳方法. 为什么?
每月330英镑的按揭贷款还款额

sentences.en: Not only interest; they even wanted repayment of part of their loans too!
sentences.cn: 不但支息金, 还想拔提一点存款呢!

sentences.en: Repayment of the bond is conditioned on 10 years'amortization.
sentences.cn: 此项债券规定分十年偿还.

sentences.en: Some of these farmers even allowed repayment in kind.
sentences.cn: 有些农民甚至同意以实物支付欠款.

sentences.en: The bank is pressing us for repayment of the loan.
The loan is due for repayment by the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 这笔借款要在年底还清。

sentences.en: The tax authorities have been harrying her for repayment.
sentences.cn: 税务局一直在催她补交税款.

sentences.en: When anyone opens a current account at a bank, he is lending the bank money, repayment of which he may demand at any time, either in cash or by drawing a cheque in fevour of another person.
sentences.cn: 任何人在银行开了活期存款户头时, 他就是把钱借给了银行,但他可以随时提取这些钱, 或者以现金的方式, 或者开一张款子付给别人的支票.

sentences.en: With a conventional repayment mortgage, the repayments consist of both capital and interest.
sentences.cn: 常规的按揭还款额既包含本金也包括利息。

sentences.en: You can pay it off or make a minimum repayment.
sentences.cn: 你可以一次付清或先付最低分期偿付款。
